Package CS509.client.driver

Class reservationBuilder

java.lang.Object
CS509.client.driver.reservationBuilder
public class reservationBuilder extends Object
This class provides an interface for reservation building.
Author:
Joe, Gokul

  • Method Details

    • searchFlights

      public void searchFlights() throws ParseException
      Searches flights
      Throws:
      ParseException

    • makeTrips

      public void makeTrips()
      Generates trips for the reservation based on the selected flights. The method adds all the departure flights to the outboundTrips list and all the arrival flights to the inboundTrips list if roundTrip is true.

    • showDepartureFlights

      public void showDepartureFlights()
      Calls displayAll method to display the Departure Flights information held within a Trips object.

    • showArrivalFlights

      public void showArrivalFlights()
      Calls displayAll method to display the Arrival Flights information held within a Trips object.

    • selectDeparture

      public void selectDeparture(Integer index)
      Sets the selected outbound trip based on the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the outbound trip to be selected

    • selectArrival

      public void selectArrival(Integer index)
      Sets the selected inbound trip based on the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the inbound trip to be selected

      public void setDepartureDate(String departureDate)
      Sets the departure date of the flight.
      Parameters:

      public void setSeatClass(String seatClass)
      Sets the seat class of the flight.
      Parameters:
      seatClass -

    • flushReservation

      public void flushReservation()
      Clears all the reservations made by the user by removing all the departure flights, arrival flights, outbound trips, and inbound trips from the corresponding lists.

    • displayReservation

      public void displayReservation()
      Displays the pending reservation details along with the total cost of the reservation. This method first determines the seat type based on whether the reservation is for coach or first class. It then displays the outbound flight(s) followed by the inbound flight(s) if the reservation is round trip. The total cost of the reservation is calculated and displayed at the end.

    • reserve

      public boolean reserve()
      Reserves the flights in the outbound trip and if round trip is true, reserves flights in inbound trip
      Returns:
      true if reservation successful for both trips, false otherwise

    • sortByPrice

      public void sortByPrice(reservationBuilder.flDirection fl)
      Sorts the list of inbound or outbound trips based on price.
      Parameters:
      fl - Direction of flight (INBOUND/OUTBOUND)

    • sortByDepartureDate

      public void sortByDepartureDate(reservationBuilder.flDirection fl)
      Sorts the list of inbound or outbound trips based on departure date.
      Parameters:
      fl - Direction of flight (INBOUND/OUTBOUND)

    • sortByArrivalDate

      public void sortByArrivalDate(reservationBuilder.flDirection fl)
      Sorts the list of inbound or outbound trips based on arrival date.
      Parameters:
      fl - Direction of flight (INBOUND/OUTBOUND)

    • sortByTripLength

      public void sortByTripLength(reservationBuilder.flDirection fl)
      Sorts the list of inbound or outbound trips based on trip length.
      Parameters:
      fl - Direction of flight (INBOUND/OUTBOUND)

    • validDate

      public boolean validDate(String userIn)
      Checks if the the given date is between the Start and End dates of the database
      Parameters:
      userIn - User input date.
      Returns:
      True if the given date is between the database start and end dates; Else false.

    • getXML

      public String getXML(ArrayList<Flight> flightList, String seatClass)
      Creates the XML to be used to reserve flights
      Parameters:
      flightList -
      seatClass -
      Returns:
      xml in the following format 
      
 <Flights>
         <Flight number=DDDDD seating=SEAT_TYPE/>
	        <Flight number=DDDDD seating=SEAT_TYPE/>
     </Flights>

      Reserves multiple flights simultaneously
      Parameters:
      flightList -
      seatClass -
      Returns:
      true if reserved successfully
